name: The Better Bunch
tagline: You know why, we know how
description:
BetterBunch is a team of software developers living for the thrill of a technical challenge ⚡. We provide full stack app development for businesses.
Our expertise lies in:
IoT,
corporate education,
rich content.
We can do iOS & Android, front and back end. 
Operating since 2011 ✊
 
A few things you may want to know about us: 
We have developed 30+ heavy duty projects.
We do hourly & project based work, retainers, agile & waterfall, onsite — whatever your project needs.
The core team consists of 16 members, but the network of trusted external talent can be extended to up to 40 professionals. 
We work best with technology companies that have a CTO but do not have enough in-house resources to cover all development needs.
Besides code, we can provide clean and intuitive designs. 
READ MORE...
